name: vscode-custom-contextmenu
description: Custom Cleaner Contextmenu for Visual Studio Code

custom-contextmenu.selectors.title: Context Menu Selectors
custom-contextmenu.selectors.description: List of aria-label selectors to hide from the context menu.

custom-contextmenu.workbenchPath.title: Workbench Path Override
custom-contextmenu.workbenchPath.description: Optional path to VS Code's workbench.html/workbench.esm.html file or the workbench directory to use when the default installation path cannot be detected.
